CustomField.description: This field checks to see if a Contract has no Divisions set to true, which should never happen on an active contract.
CustomField.formula: IF(Division_10__c = TRUE, TRUE, IF(Division_20__c = TRUE, TRUE, IF(Division_30__c = TRUE, TRUE, IF(Division_40__c = TRUE, TRUE, IF(Division_50__c = TRUE, TRUE, IF(Division_60__c = TRUE, TRUE, FALSE ))))))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field checks to see if a Contract has no Divisions set to true, which should never happen on an active contract.
CustomField.label: Division Set
